channel.title: Reftest on Searching for the Shmoo
channel.description: Recent content in Reftest on Searching for the Shmoo

item.title: State of Reftests on B2G
item.description: This quarter I’ve been focusing on getting reftests running on B2G, triaging them and fixing various issues. The purpose of this post is to outline their status, go over the work that still needs to be done and point out where I will need some help.
